replies.bodyText: We prefer top-down layout for methods and classes. Thanks in advance. 🙇
replies.author: trustin

timeline.bodyText: nit: LinkedTransferQueue, which is unbounded? (Just in case we are blocked indefinitely)
timeline.author: trustin

replies.bodyText: My reading of the docs is that add should throw IllegalStateException if we exceed the capacity?
replies.author: m50d

replies.bodyText: Ah, I was rather concerned about consuming side, but yeah, I guess it doesn't matter anyway. Maybe I just find the magic number 100 somewhat unnatural.
replies.author: trustin

replies.bodyText: It's certainly arbitrary. My thinking was that it would be better to hit an exception from hitting the limit than to grow without bound and then OOM. (In practice I doubt either would happen though).
